page.title: 10The Sewage Works
page.content: We decided that it was important to discover just how the houses in our area were supported,by the use of{ {Science and Technology}in providing services for us. We were able to find out about the sub-stations for electricity etc,but the thing which we were fascinated by,was the sewage works. At first it was difficult to arraonge a visit,but{Mr.Lees}said that we could make a trip there.It is situated in Little Oakley,and is surrounded by fields,many of which grew{experimental {plants,}to find new types of cereals. We saw where the sewage came in,how it was sifted,and then how it was sprayed onto the clinker where it degrades.The slurry is separated,the treated water runs into the{river,}while the waste solid settles.When it is full the lagoon is emptied onto the land.
